statement.tex: \text{Find the integral of the function}\\ \dfrac{\sin^2 x}{1+\cos x}

step.context: I=\int \dfrac{\sin^2 x}{1+\cos x}dx = \int(1 - \cos x)dx \\ \text{Is the following correct}?
step.reason: \int \cos (a x)dx = \dfrac{\sin (a x)}{a}+ C \\ \text{where C is the constant of integration.}
